metadata.title: CVE-2016-9578 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was discovered in SPICE before 0.13.90 in the server'sprotocol handling. An attacker able to connect to the SPICE server couldsend crafted messages which would cause the process to crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9578` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspice-server1 - 0.12.6-4ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spice package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.6-4ubuntu0.2').
